alert.note: Alert for Dallas; Monroe; Wilcox (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 07 at 9:57AM CST until February 10 at 2:49AM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Alabama... Alabama River Near Millers Ferry Dam affecting Wilcox, Monroe and Dallas Counties. For the Alabama River...including Millers Ferry Dam, Claiborne Dam... Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Alabama River Near Millers Ferry Dam. * WHEN...Until early Thursday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:30 AM CST Monday the stage was 69.3 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:30 AM CST Monday was 69.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 70.9 feet just after midnight tonight. The river is then forecast to gradually fall to below flood stage by Wednesday evening and continue falling to 47.5 feet by Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 66.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued when updates occur.
